About Me

Let me tell you a few things..

BIO

My name is Guy Asulin and I am 25.I’m an Frontend developer, and I like developing a lot. I’m always seeking to pursue and expand my experience in Frontend development in particular and development in general. I have Self-study ability, willingness to invest a lot, creativity, high work ethic, quick perception.

What do I know? ✍
